statements: SELECT * FROM public_transport_routes
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM public_transport_routes
SELECT route_id, route_name, distance_km FROM public_transport_routes WHERE distance_km > 10
SELECT * FROM public_transport_routes WHERE route_name LIKE 'Bus%'
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, distance_km FROM public_transport_routes ORDER BY distance_km DESC
SELECT * FROM public_transport_routes WHERE distance_km > 10 ORDER BY route_name DESC
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM public_transport_routes WHERE route_id = 5
SELECT route_name, distance_km FROM public_transport_routes WHERE start_location = 'City Center' AND end_location = 'Suburbia'
SELECT * FROM public_transport_routes WHERE route_id BETWEEN 3 AND 7 ORDER BY route_id
SELECT start_location, end_location FROM public_transport_routes WHERE distance_km < 5 AND route_name LIKE 'B%'
SELECT * FROM public_transportation_routes;
SELECT route_id, route_name, distance_miles FROM public_transportation_routes;
SELECT route_name, starting_point, ending_point FROM public_transportation_routes WHERE distance_miles > 10;
SELECT route_name, distance_miles FROM public_transportation_routes ORDER BY distance_miles DESC;
SELECT route_name, starting_point, ending_point, distance_miles FROM public_transportation_routes WHERE distance_miles < 5;
SELECT * FROM public_transportation_routes
SELECT route_name, starting_point, ending_point FROM public_transportation_routes ORDER BY route_name ASC
SELECT AVG(distance_miles) AS average_distance FROM public_transportation_routes

SELECT route_name, COUNT(*) AS number_of_schedule FROM public_transportation_routes JOIN transportation_schedule ON public_transportation_routes.route_id = transportation_schedule.route_id GROUP BY route_name
SELECT route_name, end_time FROM public_transportation_routes JOIN transportation_schedule ON public_transportation_routes.route_id = transportation_schedule.route_id ORDER BY end_time DESC
SELECT * FROM PublicTransportationRoutes WHERE route_type='Bus';
SELECT route_name, start_point, end_point FROM PublicTransportationRoutes WHERE route_distance > 10;
SELECT route_name, route_type, route_distance FROM PublicTransportationRoutes ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT station_name, station_location FROM TransitStations WHERE platform_count > 3 ORDER BY station_id ASC;
SELECT schedule_id, day_of_week, departure_time, arrival_time FROM TransportationSchedule WHERE departure_time < '12:00:00';
SELECT * FROM PublicTransportationRoutes WHERE route_type = 'Bus';
SELECT route_id, route_name, start_point, end_point FROM PublicTransportationRoutes ORDER BY route_name DESC;
SELECT station_id, station_name, station_location, capacity FROM TransitStations WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY station_name ASC;
SELECT schedule_id, day_of_week, departure_time, arrival_time FROM TransportationSchedule WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday' AND departure_time < '12:00';
SELECT route_id, route_name, route_distance, start_point, end_point FROM PublicTransportationRoutes WHERE route_distance BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY route_distance DESC;
SELECT * FROM Routes;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM Routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT stop_name, location, time_estimated FROM Stops ORDER BY stop_id DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, route_id, stop_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM Schedules WHERE route_id = 2 ORDER BY departure_time ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, capacity, current_location FROM Vehicles WHERE capacity > 50;
SELECT * FROM Routes
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM Routes ORDER BY route_name DESC
SELECT stop_name, location, time_estimated FROM Stops WHERE location = 'City Center'
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, departure_time, arrival_time FROM Routes INNER JOIN Schedules ON Routes.route_id = Schedules.route_id
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, capacity, current_location FROM Vehicles WHERE capacity > 50
SELECT * FROM Routes;
SELECT route_id, route_name, start_location FROM Routes ORDER BY start_location DESC;
SELECT stop_name, location FROM Stops WHERE route_id = 3;
SELECT schedule_id, departure_time FROM Schedules WHERE route_id = 1 ORDER BY departure_time ASC;
SELECT passenger_name, email FROM Passengers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%'
SELECT * FROM Routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM Routes WHERE route_id IN (2, 3);
SELECT stop_name, location FROM Stops WHERE route_id = 2 ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, departure_time FROM Schedules WHERE stop_id = 5 AND departure_time > '10:00:00';
SELECT passenger_id, passenger_name, email FROM Passengers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
